title: Band, 1601–50
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: narrow loom-woven tape bent and forlded to define pattern; tape edged with buttonhole stitch over a cord for raised outline; buttonhole stitch over a cord for connecting bars; needle-made fillings

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, 1601–50.
1601–50. Medium: linen
Technique: narrow loom-woven tape bent and forlded to define pattern; tape edged with buttonhole stitch over a cord for raised outline; buttonhole stitch over a cord for connecting bars; needle-made fillings. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-63.
